text: Ana nehina ka'ma kopima nemaniza komutomo'ene, kotkoti namamo'zane tumpa namaramimo'ene kazin tumpamo'zanena ana mopa eri nafa'a hugahaze. Ra Anumzamo'a ana mopa atreni'geno havizantfa huno, mago have kevu eri tru hunteaza hugahie. Hagi agra nomofo za'za'ane mareri'anema eri fatgoma hu'zama negaza nofikna huno kumara eri haviza hutresigeno ka'ma koka fore huno mago'zana omanegahie.
